meanings.definition: A writer of the lives of saints.
meanings.sent1: The hagiographer carefully documented the miracles of the saint.
meanings.sent2: The hagiographer's book detailed the stories of various saints.
meanings.sent3: The hagiographer's pen seemed to have a magical touch when writing about saints.
meanings.sent4: She was a hagiographer, turning the ordinary lives of saints into extraordinary tales.
meanings.sent5: The hagiographer's words painted vivid pictures of the saint's life.

meanings.definition: One who writes about the lives of saints.
meanings.sent1: As a hagiographer, he dedicated his life to chronicling the deeds of saints.
meanings.sent2: The hagiographer's work shed light on the lesser-known saints of history.
meanings.sent3: The hagiographer's stories about saints always had a touch of humor.
meanings.sent4: She was a hagiographer of emotions, capturing the essence of saintly lives.
meanings.sent5: The hagiographer's pen breathed life into the saint's adventures.
